name: Mr. Krabs Overdoses On Ketamine
description:
Play as Mr. Krabs in this all new action packed platformer. You will fight tooth and nail in order to make ends meet for your crippling ketamine addiction.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**WARNING THIS GAME IS fully DEVELOPED**

if you have any questions or concerns feel free to leave them in the thread below

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Controls

Left Click: Attack

WASD: Move

Shift: Run

Space: Jump/Climb

ALT 2x: Roll

ALT 1x: Crouch

1: Consume Ketamine Pickup

Z: Slow Motion

V: Change Angle

C: Change Camera Angle
